title: stopping bookmarks in the left or right panel always to be systematically here with a new web page
content: When I open a web page (not a tab but the first open web page) it systematically displays personal bookmarks in the side panel. How to prevent the side panel from opening when the web starts. Thanks for your help
creator: delalexben

title: add-ons aren't showing on the toolbar
content: I recently updated FireFox to it's new version and added add-ons. Usually, when an add-on gets added, it shows immediately on the top left on the toolbar. (in videos and articles). However it doesn't display on mine. I did some research and found another method: customize toolbar -> drag the add-on to the toolbar. That didn't work either because no add-ons displays when i enter customize toolbar. Instead, there's an add-ons icon to drag. Dragging it on the toolbar and clicking on it doesn't do anything. I also read that if the toolbar is full there would be a + icon and when i click on it add-ons shows up. (my toolbar is actually empty and i don't have a + icon). So yeah, i'm left with no solutions. Appreciate some help and suggestions.
creator: noid.astra

title: Bookmarks do not sync
content:
If I make a change to my bookmarks they do not sync between devices. For example I moved some bookmarks on my Windows desktop but the changes do not appear on my iPad. I tried forcing a sync on both devices but that did not work. I disconnected the sync on the iPad and then reconnected using the bar code. After watching the sync wheel spin for a while the bookmarks were in sync. Then I deleted a bookmark folder on the iPad but that change is not visible on the desktop.

Why do the bookmarks not stay in sync??
creator: dclark

title: websites not downloading properly
content: I have been having problems using websites that I have been using for years. They do not load correctly. Have reset and done many checks as suggested ie: font size, page style etc. The latest message I received for my crossword puzzle was: The game is not optimized for your browser. Please choose another browser. This is Windows 10 operating system. Do I have to leave Firefox which I don't want to do. Other websites are also having difficulties displaying their sites. Any suggestions?
creator: allprinting1

title: firefox sync auto-complete databases
content: If i enable History Sync, will it also save my auto-complete databases used in website forms?
creator: fuchs3

title: Gmail doesn't work
content: So this has been happening for around a week maybe? Youtube Music did this once and after a while it was fixed, so I didn't worry at first. I tried restarting, safe mode, clearing cookies and cache. I managed to open gmail but I couldn't sign in, it just keeps loading. All other Gmail features such as Hangouts, Drive, etc. still work, it's only Gmail that doesn't. Is it related to the fact that my adblockers keep uninstalling?
creator: amylastlast123

title: Firefox Using Way Too Much RAM
content:
I'm on a Mac, running Catalina, with 64 GBs of RAM, and Firefox is using about 20+ GBs of RAM, and very high CPU usage. I keep trying new updated versions, hoping this will no longer be an issue, but it persists. Is there anything I can really do, to tamper it down?

I tried opening FF in safe mode, only to find several windows with several tabs on each GONE! Why should troubleshooting issues only make me more frustrated and ready to can this browser forever? Help should be help, not making things worse...
creator: StevenCee

title: Not able to screenshot at all
content: Ive tried everything that this site said to do for taking a screenshot and nothing works.
creator: williamsd006

title: Peda Favorito/Histórico
content:
Olá..

Infelizmente tenho tido muito problemas de travamento do FireFox, toda vez foi obrigado a forçar o fechamento das janelas e abrir uma nova, tendo obrigatoriamente que fazer novo login na conta para carregar as pastas de favoritos e históricos de navegação.

O maior problema é que na data de hoje, perdi toda minha pasta de favoritos, o que é bem ruim e constrangedor, pois organizei e deixei todos os links salvos e sempre conto com esse facilitador para ter o acesso rápido..

Será que é possível recuperá-los?
creator: paulo.coliveira

title: I am now running Firefox V88.0.1  Is the new OS 89.0.?
content: Is the new Firefox OS different than 88.0.1, which is the OS I currently have installed.
creator: maraft70

title: remove fire fox from all devices and sync later
content:
I am going to travel and I want to wipe all my devices, then get to my destination and then reinstall firefox on my devices again and sync.

Will this work? Does mozilla have a copy of the data stored like "cloud"?

Or must I leave one device synced, but logged out?
creator: rae.long

title: Problem with streaming and more
content:
Sirius xm website loads, but will not play music; some (not all) other websites will not load videos. Microsoft Edge does not have this/these problems. Missing add-on or incorrect settings?

Sirius xm has following message "Sorry, we have experienced an issue. Please tune to another channel or episode." Which does not help.
creator: donnemeth04

title: Firefox
content: 'Die Seite Nur Englisch ! Schwaches Bild !!! ' Es vergehen Tage bevor der Firefox updatet , ob wohl CHIP.de und Computer Bild.d. die neue Version bereits haben. Lasst Euch einsalzen !
creator: Dieter.Hoffstadt

title: Pestañas Firefox crashean muy a menudo.
content:
No existe un momento en específico en el que pase, a veces llevo 5 minutos viendo algun video y de la nada la pestaña me indica un error.

title: Google blocked by HSTS...
content:
Everybody knows that google.com don't have any problems in latest Firefox builds, right?

Then why I have this HSTS on google from last week. It's blocking YouTube, Gmail, Calendar and other apps.

Pls help.

P.s. I don't have any issue with my 2nd laptop and my PC. Only on this device I'm using now.

title: Playlists stops or song restarts few times on youtube
content: Currently installed 88.0.1 on Win7x64. Had to install Chrome because playing youtube playlists on Firefox became unbearable. On youtube.com and music.youtube.com many songs starts playing normally, then after few seconds, sometimes even over 10 seconds song restarts and start again. And this again is sometimes 3 times. It is not always the same songs. And it is not on every song on playlist. I would say it is random. Second problem is that after few songs has been played youtube choose next song and stops without any error. I need to push button play to continue. I tried to remove cookies, clean data and run in safe mode. Not sure when it started but i think at least 2 weeks has already passed. Don't observe this on Chrome so i will temporary switch to Chrome with youtube.
creator: zygdresze1

title: audio gets choppy when sped up
content: so regardless of what video streaming platform I use whenever I speed up the video to more than 1.5x it gets really choppy and irritating while the problem is non existent when I am using other browsers
creator: abdullah.ahmed9003

title: Search function
content:
What is wrong with the search function? It doesn't work properly, especially with .pdf's. Also the search bar opens by just pressing keys. Why can't the search bar activate by pressing ctrl+f like? It wants me to use this semi working search function so badly? Sometimes I can't even use shortcuts like M to mute videos because it instantly opens the buggy search function.

gg
creator: yaticin343

title: Lost all myTabs.
content: I lost all my Tabs. Please help.
creator: nix2354

title: firefox changes page sign in to wordpress
content: I am signing in to a website of which i am a member. But when the sign-in page loads, it takes me to a wordpress sign-in for the site! I've tried this in safe mode with same results. When using Chrome this doesn't happen. I'm using latest version of Firefox. thanks!
creator: tkaufman1

title: 'Forget About This Site' functionality in history pane, prone to misunderstanding
content:
Hello There,

In the history pane which could be opened by Ctrl + H shortcut, 'Forget About This Site' functionality creates impression to clear all history about that afformentioned site but it removes everything about the site including the passwords.

I understand the perspective about 'forgetting' is different that i mention above but when you are in action like removing the passwords from the password manager you should clearly ask the user about this action.

This functionality really bothered me and i try to disable it and i came accross with 'DisableForgetButton' policy which i thought that i would disable this feature and keep me safe from unintenional 'Forget About This Site' click in history pane but it wont.

As a conculision; 1- I think Firefox should ask about the action with this critical level which is deleting the saved passwords in password manger 2- If you are not able to ask about this action you should allow users or system managers to control this ability.
creator: cihanuygun2009

title: Adobe PDF setting keeps resetting/changing
content:
Hi,

I have changed the setting in options to open all PDF's with Adobe reader but for some reason every few days or after a week it resets to downloading the file rather than using Adobe to open it. Is there a reason for this?

Thanks for any help. Chris
creator: chrisschultz1970

title: Firefox won't load Website
content:
Hi,

Upgraded to 88 from 85 and Firefox are won't loading this website: https://huntingtopic.com/ just keeps going with the loading animation. Chromium works fine. Yeah I tried all the stuff on the website about disabling Ivp 6 and prefetching and all that. Please Help me!

Thanks in Advance
creator: andrewtye68

title: Event hashchange and document.title
content:
I have a problem with some JavaScript code that is run on a hashchange event.

The code updates the web document, and also the document.title. The document.title is modified last.

If not modifying document.title, everything works fine. If updating document.title, the code sometimes fails, but not always. The symptoms are as follows.

  • The document.title is updated correctly, according to the A-tag with the hash URL that was clicked.
  • The URL field in the browser is not updated to the new value.
  • Non of the other document updates are done, even if they are performed on the code lines before changing document.title.

If a move the mouse outside Firefox and click in another window, the browser URL field is updated and the rest of the document is updated.

I then tried the code in google-chrome. There everything works fine.

If I add a console.log() in the hashchange eventhandler, everything works fine. Another work-around is to use window.setTimeout and delay modification of document.title by e.g. 10ms.

Is this a problem in Firefox, or am I not supposed to modify document.title on the hashchange event?

I am using Firefox 88.01 for Fedora 33.

I guess I should not include HTML and JavaScript in this editor?
creator: bj_t60

title: How to delete old username/passwords
content:
I am suffering from slow load times -- especially the first time when the firefox is loaded for that day. Likewise there is a big pause when I go into settings -- saved usernames/passwords. Over the years I built up thousands of these pairings..

How can I easily remove all the old ones - say a year or older?

Please don't say, select the one, click delete, answer to are you sure prompt etc, as these actions take ages to do one at a time.
creator: tkalfaoglu

title: YouTube TV Buffering Problem with Firefox
content:
I have hit what appears to be a "YouTube TV" (vs YouTube) buffering problem. It happens only with Firefox on my PCs. After a few seconds to a minute of playing a TV program or movie, the video/audio stops with a spinning arrow. If I previously had turned on "stats for nerds" to monitor this, I can see when network activity stops and the buffer then eventually gets exhausted.

This does NOT happen when running YouTube TV on my TVs or on my iPhone. Probably more significant, it does NOT happen with YouTube TV under either Microsoft Edge or Google Chrome on these PCs. If I run Firefox in Troubleshoot Mode, i.e., no add-ons, extensions, etc., the problem still exists, so it is not just some rogue add-on, but is related to Firefox itself. The problem appears to be only for "YouTube TV" on Firefox since, for example, videos played from YouTube (vs "YouTube TV") do not have the problem under Firefox.

I tried rebooting my router as well as the PCs. The problem still existed. The PCs are high speed and the internet connection is fiber optic. One of the PCs is connected by Ethernet; the other is wireless. Download/upload speeds are over 900 Mbps on the Ethernet PC. I have not seen slow network indications on anything except this "YouTube TV" with Firefox mixture. Hardware does not seem to be the issue.

Apparently the problem is software. I also tried temporarily disabling my antivirus/firewall software. No change. I'm running Windows 10 version 21H1 and Firefox 88.0.1. I'm new to YouTube TV; although most of my viewing with it has been done on TVs, I don't recall seeing this problem in my PC tests a month or so ago.
creator: jeff154

title: Firefox open udp ports
content:
firefox 88.0.1-1 on linux Since recently firefox started to open random udp ports that's what i see in netstat udp 0 0 0.0.0.0:36531 0.0.0.0:* 16227/firefox udp 0 0 0.0.0.0:43783 0.0.0.0:* 16227/firefox It only happens on some sites likes youtube and discord is that related to http3 in some way? there is nothing in about:networking

I am just not sure if this is anything to be concerned with, i did a bunch of searches for firefox open ports, but couldn't find an answer
creator: 0nrefn1

title: Connection not secure on well-known sites
content:
I have noticed that recently a lot of well-known and trusted sites(eg- youtube) are showing connection not secure (Parts of page are not secure such as images and any information that you share may be leaked -passwords etc) . Sometimes when I reload the site, it again shows connection secure.

Is this a glitch or something to be worried about and is there a solution?

Firefox Version - 88.0.1 (64-bit) OS- Ubuntu 20.04.2 LTS
creator: prkandmap23

title: Trouble importing bookmarks from HTML file
content: I exported my bookmarks from the Brave Browser, selected Bookmarks>Manage Bookmarks>Import and Backup>Import Bookmarks from HTML Then navigated to the HTML file the selected "Open" but noting changed except that a small number of the bookmarks appears under "Recent Bookmarks" when I again select Bookmarks. Each item in this list is repeated according to the number of times I tried to import them.
creator: plho

title: Once I clear cache...
content: Whenever I clear the cache then when I log back into twitter or YT I have to reset to dark theme. This did not happen with Opera which I took out and replaced with FF on Windows 10 laptop. Is there a fix for this pls? Thanks so much!!
creator: astralchyld

title: Searches and Top Sites
content: Whatever I search for (using DuckDuckGo as FF is NOT private search engine) ends up on my Top Sites. I have to keep hitting Dismiss for every site I go to! Please, there must be an easy fix for this? TY!!
creator: astralchyld

title: Images within an article in Yahoo news are all blanks but the space for the image is there
content: Looking at stories in Yahoo news and the heading picture is there but any images imbedded within the story are a blank. Right clicking on that blank location where the story pictures should be does not get a "properties" notation nor anything else. It's as if it has not downloaded at all. It's easy to eliminate any anti virus protections from interfering because it happens on all of my computers. My Windows 10 computers use Firefox 64 bit 88.0.1 and one uses Norton 360 anti virus and the other uses Trend Micro anti virus. My other computers are running on Linux Mint 20.1 and Firefox 86.0.1. The fact that two different OS's display the same trouble points straight to Firefox.
creator: cavman35
